bibl.title: Female Choruses and Gardens of Nymphs: Visualizing Chorality in Sappho.

bibl.title: The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual

bibl.seg: Katerina Ladianou, Female Choruses and Gardens of Nymphs: Visualizing Chorality in Sappho.

Vanessa Cazzato & André Lardinois (edd.), with an Introduction by Anastasia-Erasmia Peponi, The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 1 = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 391 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 343-369.
